snippet.title: Resident Evil - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
The game that defined the survival-horror genre is back! Thrill to all the original chills and spills in this remastered update of the classic Resident Evil game. 

Relive an enhanced version of the game that defined the survival-horror genre and launched a franchise that has sold over 61 million copies!

'Like' on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/residentevil

Follow on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/RE_games
